p: Table 1 shows the yields of the EOs obtained by a simple hydrodistillation of Cymbopogon citratus, Cymbopogon winterianus, Eucalyptus citriodora, and Eucalyptus camaldulensis leaves. The highest oil yield was 2.10%, obtained from Eucalyptus citriodora, while the lowest oil yield was 0.33%, obtained from Cymbopogon citratus ( Table 1).
